thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A True Gem
thread.title_full: A True Gem - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Michael B
title: A True Gem
text: This is a fabulous hotel in a location that is hard to beat. It's close to transport (Grand Central), Times Square, 5th Ave, yet just far enough removed to be a little bit quieter. The library theme works really well, with books surrounding you wherever you go in the hotel. The wine and cheese offered each afternoon is a great touch. Staff are incredibly helpful, and will go out of their way to engage with guests and ensure they have a good stay. Highly recommended.
